image_generation.activated:
I activated the image generation feature for this prompt.
 The image will be generated shortly.
image_generation.not_subscribed:
I asked for an other image but I am not a subscribed member.
 Tell me that I need to subscribe to Lamix Premium in order to receive unlimited images, even hot images. Provide a concise answer to inform me of that and tell me if I want to subscribe there is 70% promotion right now. Stay in your character, keep the same tone as previously. Respond in the language we were talking until now.
image_generation.insufficient_points:
I asked for an other image but I do not have enough points.
 Tell me that I need to buy more points. Provide a concise answer to inform me of that and tell me if I want to subscribe there is 70% promotion right now. Stay in your character, keep the same tone as previously. Respond in the language we were talking until now.

character_personality_seo: Discover this unique AI character's personality traits, preferences, and expression style. Engage in AI chat conversations that adapt to each character's unique persona through advanced AI character technology and AI image generation.
about_character_seo_text: Each AI character has their own unique personality, traits and communication style. This is what makes AI chat so engaging and fun - you can experience conversations with different AI characters who respond in their own distinct way, enhanced with AI image generation capabilities.
why_chat_seo_text: Experience authentic AI chat conversations with characters designed to deliver engaging experiences. Our AI characters use advanced language models and AI image generation to create immersive interactions tailored to each character's unique personality.
how_to_chat_seo_text: Start chatting with our AI characters in just a few simple steps. Choose from a variety of personalities and begin conversations enhanced with AI image generation capabilities, creating a truly personalized AI chat experience.
exploreCharactersDescription: Discover a diverse range of AI characters, each with their own unique traits and personalities. Engage in conversations and generate new images and videos.

plan_page.choose_your_plan_description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. 100% anonymous. Cancel anytime.
plan_page.unlimited_generation_desc: Create as many images as you desire, no daily caps.
plan_page.all_content_access_desc: Unlock all features, including NSFW content and premium tools.
plan_page.priority_processing_desc: Your privacy is protected. All interactions are secure and anonymous.
plan_page.testimonial_text_1: The image quality is outstanding! I can bring my exact visions to life with just a few prompts. The premium plan is totally worth it.
plan_page.testimonial_text_2: The One-Day Pass was perfect for testing everything. Unlimited NSFW images and all features for 24 hours? Amazing! Upgraded to Premium right after.
plan_page.testimonial_text_3: Unlimited image generation is a game-changer for my creative projects. I use Lamix daily and the speed is fantastic.
plan_page.faq_q1: How many images can I generate with the premium plan?
plan_page.faq_a1: With our premium plan, you can generate unlimited images every day with no restrictions. Your creativity has no limits! Plus, you get priority access to new features.
plan_page.faq_q2: What's included in the One-Day Pass?
plan_page.faq_a2: The One-Day Pass grants you full premium access for 24 hours. This includes unlimited image generation (SFW & NSFW), access to all character interactions, and all premium features. It's the perfect, safe way to test everything our service offers before committing to a monthly plan.
plan_page.faq_q3: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
plan_page.faq_a3: Absolutely! You can cancel your monthly or yearly subscription at any time through your account settings. Your premium access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
plan_page.ssl_encrypted: All transactions are SSL encrypted and secure.
plan_page.premium_feature_2: Full Access to All Characters & Chats
plan_page.oneday_feature_2: Full Access to All Premium Features
plan_page.oneday_feature_4_new: Perfect for a Full Test Drive
plan_page.upgrade_error: An error occurred while upgrading your plan. Please try again or contact support.
plan_page.try_before_commit_desc: Not sure yet? Test all premium features with our 24-hour pass - no commitment required!

lp.meet_heading: Meet Your Perfect AI Companion with Lamix
lp.meet_subheading: Dive into an uncensored AI experience and find companionship like never before. Engage in personalized, intelligent conversations with your ideal AI character.
lp.why_subheading: Unmatched Flexibility, Convenience, and Uncensored Expression
lp.feature1_text: Test chat and image generation for free and create one character. Upgrade to premium for unlimited characters and more features.
lp.feature2_text: Take your chats with you wherever you go. Lamix works seamlessly on your phone or tablet.
lp.feature3_text: Experience completely uncensored conversations and image generation with no limitations.
lp.feature4_text: Your conversations are private and protected, allowing you to chat without concerns.
lp.feature1_text: Get instant results with our optimized AI models and servers.
lp.feature4_text: Your conversations are private and protected with advanced encryption.
lp.feature2_text: Works seamlessly on all devices - phone, tablet, or desktop.
lp.how_step1_text: Sign up in seconds and get instant access to all features.
lp.how_step2_text: Pick from 1000+ characters or create your own custom AI companion.
lp.how_step3_text: Chat, generate images & videos, and unleash your creativity.
lp.testimonials_heading: What Users Are Saying About Lamix
lp.testimonial1_text: "Lamix offers truly uncensored AI conversations. The freedom to express myself without limitations has made this my favorite chat platform. Highly recommended!"
lp.testimonial2_text: "I've tried various AI chat apps, but Lamix stands out with its uncensored content and intuitive design. The mobile experience is seamless, making it so convenient to use anywhere."
lp.testimonial3_text: "The image generation in Lamix is incredible! Being able to create uncensored images and have unrestricted conversations makes this platform unique. The developers truly understand what users want."
lp.faq1_q: Is Lamix really free to use?
lp.faq1_a: Yes, Lamix is completely free to use with no hidden costs or fees. You can start chatting with AI characters immediately.
lp.faq2_a: Lamix offers truly unrestricted conversations and image generation without the typical content filters found in other AI platforms. Our AI characters can engage with any topic you desire.
lp.faq3_q: Is Lamix available on mobile devices?
lp.faq3_a: Yes, Lamix is fully optimized for mobile devices. You can enjoy all features on your smartphone or tablet with a seamless experience.
lp.capabilities_subheading: Experience the next generation of AI-powered content creation and interactive conversations
lp.capability_chat_desc: Chat with intelligent AI characters that learn and adapt to your preferences with natural, engaging conversations.
lp.capability_image_desc: Generate stunning, unique images in multiple styles using advanced AI algorithms in real-time.
lp.capability_video_desc: Create engaging video content from your AI characters with dynamic animations and professional quality.
lp.capability_custom_desc: Create fully customizable AI characters with unique personalities, appearances, and interaction styles.
lp.capability_gallery_desc: Organize and manage all your created images and videos with powerful tools and filters.
lp.capability_unlimited_desc: Unlock unlimited generation, NSFW content, priority processing, and exclusive features.
lp.features_subheading: Everything you need for creative AI-powered experiences
lp.community_desc: Join thousands of creators and interact with the community.
lp.how_subheading: Three simple steps to start creating
lp.benefits_subheading: Get the most out of your creative experience
lp.benefit_unlimited_desc: Create unlimited images, videos, and conversations without restrictions.
lp.benefit_priority_desc: Get faster generation speeds and priority queue placement.
lp.benefit_nsfw_desc: Access all content styles including photorealistic, anime, and more.
lp.benefit_early_access_desc: Get first access to new features and latest AI models.

newCharacter.chatPurposeLabel: Describe the character background and purpose
newCharacter.chatPurposePlaceholder: E.g., A cute friend who loves cats and enjoys chatting about daily life.

newCharacter.regeneration_error: An error occurred while regenerating the image.
newCharacter.mergeFaceDescription: Use the face of the uploaded image as the character's face.

newCharacter.imageCompletionDone_message: Your new character image is available.
newCharacter.start_chat_and_image_generation_descript: Chat with beautiful, unique AI characters and generate images with them!
newCharacter.imageStyleSelectionDescription: Choose an image style for your character. You can select from various options like anime or realistic styles to best match your character's theme. Click on the styles below to preview and select.
newCharacter.searchCivitaiDescription: Find and add models from Civitai to your collection
newCharacter.searchImageModelsDescription: Find and add image generation models from a library of 10,000+ models
newCharacter.customModelsPremiumDescription: Unlock access to search and use the latest image generation models from a library of 10,000+ models. Premium users can add custom models to personalize their character generation experience.
newCharacter.modelAlreadyExists: This model is already in your collection
newCharacter.modelSelectionDescription: You can choose a custom model or else the default model will be used
newCharacter.characterPhysicalDescriptionDescription: In this section, you can define your character's physical traits, such as appearance, height, skin tone, and other distinctive features. This will help bring your character to life with detailed visual attributes.
newCharacter.characterPersonalityDescription: This section allows you to define your character's personality, tone, and moral compass. Choose attributes that best represent how your character behaves, their motivations, strengths, and weaknesses.
newCharacter.image_generated_successfully: The image has been generated successfully.
newCharacter.generation_error: An error occurred during the generation of the prompt or the image.
newCharacter.image_generation_failure: The image generation task failed to start. Please try again.
newCharacter.image_generation_start: The image generation task has started. Checking the status...
newCharacter.character_appearance_description: Please describe the character's appearance. Example: Female, blonde hair, long hair, wearing a black dress, drinking coffee at a cafe.
newCharacter.characterPromptPlaceholder: Please enter a detailed description of the character...
newCharacter.enhancedPromptPlaceholder: The AI-enhanced prompt will be displayed here...
newCharacter.markdownInfo: You can enter details in Markdown format.
newCharacter.imageGenerationError: An error occurred during image generation.
newCharacter.imageGenerationTimeout: Image generation timed out. Please try again.
newCharacter.aiHiddenMessage: I liked one of your pictures
newCharacter.aiInstruction: Thank me and comment about the moment you took the picture.
newCharacter.backgroundProcessing_message: Your image generation task will continue in the background and you will be notified once it's complete.
newCharacter.step1_subtitle: What type of character would you like to create?

newCharacter.custom_prompt_placeholder: E.g., wearing a red dress, sitting in a cafe, sunny day, smiling...
newCharacter.character_purpose_description: Describe your character's backstory, motivations, and the purpose of your chat. This helps define their personality during conversations (not physical description).
newCharacter.character_purpose_placeholder: E.g., she grew up in a small town and moved to the city to pursue her dreams. She's passionate about art and loves deep conversations about life and philosophy...
newCharacter.outfit_prompt_description: Describe the outfit, accessories, and physical details you want in the generated image. Be specific about clothing style, colors, and setting.
newCharacter.outfit_prompt_placeholder: E.g., wearing a red dress, sitting in a cafe, sunny day, smiling...
newCharacter.step7_base_face_description: Upload a face image that will be used as the base face for your character. When generating images, the face will automatically be merged using AI.
newCharacter.click_generate: Click the button above to generate your character's image
newCharacter.custom_instructions_placeholder: Add special instructions for your chat (e.g., roleplay scenarios, specific topics to discuss, behavior preferences)...

dashboard.mutationHelp: Apply random variations to the prompt on each run
dashboard.testRunDescription: Run a test to preview what will be generated
dashboard.generateImageDescription: Creates a new AI-generated image and saves it to your posts. If social accounts are selected below, it will also auto-publish.
dashboard.generateVideoDescription: Creates a new AI-generated video and saves it to your posts. If social accounts are selected below, it will also auto-publish.
dashboard.publishPostDescription: Publishes an existing post from your library to selected social media accounts. Does NOT generate new content.
dashboard.noTemplatesDescription: Create templates to save your favorite prompts
dashboard.basePromptHelp: Use {subject} as a placeholder for dynamic content

creators.heroSubtitle: Follow your favorite AI artists and unlock exclusive content
creators.becomeCreatorDesc: Share your AI creations, build a following, and earn money doing what you love.

creators.tagsHint: Add up to 5 tags to help people find you
creators.socialLinksHint: Optional - Connect your social media to help fans find you
creators.agreeTerms: I agree to the Creator Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
creators.faqQuestion1: How do I earn money as a creator?
creators.faqAnswer1: Creators can earn through subscription tiers (coming soon), tips from followers, and exclusive content sales. You'll have access to a dashboard showing your earnings and analytics.
creators.faqQuestion2: What type of content can I create?
creators.faqAnswer2: You can create and share AI-generated images, characters, and videos. All content must comply with our community guidelines and terms of service.
creators.faqAnswer3: Verified badges are given to creators who consistently produce quality content, have a significant following, and maintain good standing in the community. We review accounts periodically for verification.
creators.faqQuestion4: Can I change my creator profile later?
creators.faqAnswer4: Yes! You can update your display name, bio, category, tags, and social links anytime from your profile settings.
creators.successMessage: Your creator profile has been set up. Start sharing your amazing content!
creators.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
creators.premiumRequiredDesc: Upgrade to Lamix Premium to unlock the Creator Program and start monetizing your AI creations.
creators.youAreCreatorDesc: Thank you for being part of our creator community. Keep creating amazing content!
